Terms.title: Terms of Service
Terms.metaDescription: Terms of Service for TrySchedule - Free Online Schedule Builder.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using TrySchedule ("the Service"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provisions of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by these terms, please do not use the Service.

description.title: 2. Description of Service
description.content: TrySchedule is a web-based scheduling and planning tool that allows users to create, manage, and share schedules. We provide various subscription tiers including free and paid options with different feature sets.

userAccounts.title: 3. User Accounts
userAccounts.intro: To use certain features of the Service, you must register for an account. You agree to:
items: Provide accurate and complete information during registration
Maintain the security of your password and account
Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account
Accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account

payment.title: 4. Payment Terms
payment.content: For paid subscriptions, you agree to pay all fees associated with your chosen plan. Payments are processed through our third-party payment provider. Subscriptions automatically renew unless cancelled before the renewal date.

acceptableUse.title: 5. Acceptable Use
items: Use the Service for any unlawful purpose
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any portion of the Service
Interfere with or disrupt the Service or servers
Upload malicious code or content
Resell or redistribute the Service without authorization

thirdParty.title: 6. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content1: Our Service allows you to connect with third-party services, such as Google Calendar, to enhance your scheduling experience. By using these integrations, you agree to comply with the terms and privacy policies of those third-party services.
thirdParty.content2: We are not responsible for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party services. We encourage you to review the terms and privacy policies of any third-party service before connecting it to TrySchedule.

intellectualProperty.title: 7. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: The Service and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by TrySchedule and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

liability.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: In no event shall TrySchedule be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of or inability to use the Service.

changes.title: 9. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of significant changes via email or through the Service. Continued use of the Service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

contact.title: 10. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.metaDescription: Privacy Policy for TrySchedule - Free Online Schedule Builder.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: TrySchedule ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our TrySchedule service.

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.intro: When you register for an account, we may collect:
items: Name and email address
Profile information you choose to provide
Payment information (processed securely by our payment provider)

usageInfo.title: Usage Information
items: Device and browser information
IP address and location data
Usage patterns and feature interactions
Cookies and similar tracking technologies

howWeUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
items: Provide and maintain our Service
Process your transactions and manage your subscription
Send you updates, security alerts, and support messages
Improve and personalize your experience
Analyze usage patterns to enhance our Service
Comply with legal obligations

informationSharing.title: 4. Information Sharing
informationSharing.intro: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with:
items: Service providers who assist in operating our Service
Business partners with your consent
Legal authorities when required by law

analytics.title: 5. Analytics and Third-Party Tools
analytics.intro: We use third-party analytics services to help us understand how users interact with our Service and to improve user experience. These services may collect anonymous data about your usage of the Service.

googleAnalytics.title: Google Analytics
googleAnalytics.content: We use Google Analytics, a web analytics service provided by Google, Inc. Google Analytics uses cookies to analyze how users use our Service. The information generated is transmitted to and stored by Google. For more information on how Google uses data, please visit

microsoftClarity.title: Microsoft Clarity
microsoftClarity.content: We use Microsoft Clarity, a user behavior analytics tool provided by Microsoft. Clarity captures how users interact with our Service through session recordings and heatmaps. Clarity automatically masks sensitive content to protect user privacy. For more information, please visit

optingOut.title: Opting Out
optingOut.content: You can opt out of analytics tracking by adjusting your browser settings to block cookies or by using browser extensions designed to block tracking scripts.

googleUserData.title: 6. Google User Data
googleUserData.intro: TrySchedule uses Google OAuth to allow you to connect your Google account and sync your local schedule with Google Calendar.

infoAccess.title: Information We Access
infoAccess.intro: When you connect your Google account, we request the following permissions:
items: View your calendar settings: We use this to detect your primary Google Calendar timezone, ensuring synchronized events appear at the correct time.
View and edit events on your calendars: We use this to create, update, and manage the schedule events you choose to sync from TrySchedule to your Google Calendar.

howWeUseData.title: How We Use This Data
howWeUseData.content: Our use of information received from Google APIs is strictly limited to providing and improving the Calendar Sync feature. We do not store your Google Calendar data on our servers, nor do we use it for advertising or share it with any third parties except as necessary to provide the service.

limitedUse.title: Google API Limited Use Policy
limitedUse.content: TrySchedule's use and transfer to any other app of information received from Google APIs will adhere to the
limitedUse.linkText: Google API Services User Data Policy

dataSecurity.title: 7. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data, including encryption, secure servers, and regular security assessments. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

yourRights.title: 8. Your Rights
yourRights.intro: Depending on your location, you may have the right to:
items: Access your personal data
Correct inaccurate data
Request deletion of your data
Object to or restrict processing
Data portability
Withdraw consent at any time

cookies.title: 9. Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage, and deliver personalized content. You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings.

childrenPrivacy.title: 10. Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: Our Service is not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you believe we have collected such information, please contact us immediately.

changes.title: 11. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.

contact.title: 12. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at

Contact.metaDescription: Contact TrySchedule - We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message about questions, feedback, or support.

header.title: Contact Us
header.subtitle: Have questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.

items.question: Is the schedule builder really free?
items.answer: Yes! Our free online schedule builder allows you to create, edit, and download schedules as images without paying a dime. You only pay if you need advanced features like PDF export or AI automation.

items.question: How does the AI schedule builder work?
items.answer: Our AI scheduler analyzes your input (tasks, employees, time slots) and automatically generates an optimized roster, saving you hours of manual planning.

items.question: Can I use this for employee shift scheduling?
items.answer: Absolutely. The Pro plan is designed for managers. You can build work shift schedules, handle rotations, and export the final roster to Excel for payroll easily.

items.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel your monthly subscription instantly from your dashboard. No questions asked. 30-day money-back guarantee.

reviews.sarah: Best free schedule builder I've found. The drag-and-drop is so intuitive!
reviews.mike: Perfect for creating my weekly class schedule. Love the instant PNG export.

resetConfirm.title: Reset Everything
resetConfirm.description: This will clear all sidebar template features, restore your settings to default, and delete all events from the calendar. This action cannot be undone.

items.question: Are these templates really free?
items.answer: Most of our schedule templates are free to use; you can preview, customize, and export your schedule for free. A few schedule templates, such as those generated by AI, require a professional subscription.

items.question: How do I use a template?
items.answer: Simply click on any template to preview it, then click 'Use This Template' to load it into the editor. From there, you can customize colors, times, labels, and add or remove events to match your needs.

items.question: Can I customize the templates?
items.answer: Absolutely! Once you load a template into the editor, you have full control to modify every aspect - change event times, colors, titles, add new events, or delete existing ones. The templates are just starting points.

items.question: What export formats are available?
items.answer: Free users can export schedules as PNG or JPG images (with watermark). Pro users get access to watermark-free exports, PDF format for high-quality printing, and CSV format for data analysis.

items.question: Will my schedule be saved?
items.answer: Your schedule is automatically saved in your browser's local storage. Pro users also get cloud sync, which allows you to access your schedules from any device.

preview.aiTitle: Let AI create your perfect schedule

seo.faqSubtitle: Everything you need to know about our free schedule builder.

q1.question: Why is TrySchedule the best free online schedule builder?
q1.answer:
TrySchedule stands out for three key reasons:

‚Ä¢ Zero Friction ‚Äì no login or signup required, just start creating immediately.
‚Ä¢ Instant Export ‚Äì download your schedule as high-quality PNG or PDF with one click.
‚Ä¢ Visual & Intuitive ‚Äì drag-and-drop interface with beautiful color-coded blocks makes scheduling effortless.

These features make TrySchedule the fastest way to build a professional weekly schedule online.

q2.question: How do I create a weekly schedule in 3 easy steps?
q2.answer:
Step 1: Drag and drop on the calendar grid to create time blocks for your activities.

Step 2: Customize each block with many vibrant colors to categorize work, study, fitness, or personal time.

Step 3: Click 'Export' to download your finished schedule as PNG, JPG, or PDF ‚Äì ready to print or share.

The entire process takes less than 5 minutes, no design skills needed.

q3.question: Who needs a schedule builder like TrySchedule?
q3.answer:
TrySchedule is designed for everyone who values their time:

‚Ä¢ Students ‚Äì organizing class timetables and study sessions
‚Ä¢ Shift Managers ‚Äì creating employee work rotations
‚Ä¢ Gym Goers ‚Äì planning weekly workout routines
‚Ä¢ Freelancers ‚Äì balancing multiple client projects and deadlines

Whether you need a simple daily planner or a complex weekly schedule, our visual builder adapts to your needs.

q4.question: Is this schedule builder completely free to use?
q4.answer:
Yes, TrySchedule is 100% free for core features!

Create unlimited schedules, use all colors, export as PNG or JPG, and save your work locally ‚Äì all without paying a cent or creating an account.

Pro features like PDF export, AI-powered scheduling suggestions, and cross-device cloud sync are available for power users who want advanced capabilities.

q5.question: Can I print my schedule after creating it?
q5.answer:
Absolutely! TrySchedule is designed to be printable-friendly.

Export your schedule as a high-resolution PNG or PDF, then print it directly on standard paper sizes. The clean, minimalist design ensures your printed schedule looks professional and is easy to read.

Perfect for posting on your wall, refrigerator, or office bulletin board.

q6.question: Is my schedule data private and secure?
q6.answer:
Your privacy is our priority.

By default, all schedule data stays in your browser's local storage ‚Äì nothing leaves your device unless you choose otherwise.

Your schedules remain completely private unless you explicitly choose to enable cloud sync with a Pro account. You have full control over your data at all times.
